scripts.build: node -e "const {execSync}=require('node:child_process'); const run=c=>execSync(c,{stdio:'inherit',shell:true}); run('pnpm exec tsx scripts/assert-env.ts'); run('prisma generate'); if (process.env.VERCEL === '1' || process.env.USE_MOCK === 'true') { console.log('Skipping prisma migrate deploy on Vercel/CI or mock mode'); } else { run('prisma migrate deploy'); } run('next build');"
scripts.postinstall: echo skip prisma generate on postinstall
